description: Formative Evaluation Services for the Supporting Blended Finance: the global network for blended finance project.
full_summary:
### General Public Tender Announcement
#### [English]
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is seeking the services of a contractor to provide formative evaluation services for the Supporting Blended Finance: the global network for blended finance project.

#### [French]
Le ministère des Affaires étrangères, commerce et développement (MAECD) est à la recherche des services d'un consultant pour fournir des services d'évaluation formative pour le projet Appuyer Convergence : le réseau mondial du financement mixte.

### Procurement Details

* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01028045
* **Solicitation Number**: 23-227744/c
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 21, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time
* **Procurement Category**: Service (SRV)
* **Notice Type**: Request for proposal (Demande de propositions)

### Contract Details

* **Contract Type**: Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Contract Period**: Seven (7) months from contract award
* **Contract Region**: Canada

### Eligibility and Selection

* **GSIN**: R019BF (Human Resource Services, Business Consulting/Change Management; Project Management Services)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (MAECD)
* **Contact Person**: Francine Marcotte
* **Contact Email**: francine.marcotte@international.gc.ca

### Tender Package

* **Link to Attachment**: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/28/988352e4031aa05ba46c4f23a38f4caa/23-227744_c_-_tsps_-_npp.pdf (English)
* **Link to Attachment**: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/28/eddffe1ac1fcfa4d9d64159536ba1184/23-227744_c_-_tsps_-_apm.pdf (French) ighthouse
